venue.name: Bear and Grill Restaurants in Orange

item.description:
Need a break from teh hsutle & bustle of the holiday season? Join us for a brief respite witha happy hour of music and friends!

﻿﻿﻿

For anyone who is new to Party Express - or just haven't been paying attention - I (Tom “The Captain” Ferrara) am a PartyExpress! member. I play a classic selection of acoustic rock that includes everyone from James Taylor and The Beatles to Green Day and Collective Soul. 

 I've performed a numebr of happy hours, open mic nights and private partied from the lving room to the patio to the beach. I also played wine-tasting benefits for The Estuary Council in Old Saybrook and Literacy Volunteers Valley Shore CT and headlined Sunday afternoon at this year's Old Saybrook Arts and Crafts Festival. 

This week, I'm back at

 Bear & Grill - Orange 

 on Friday evening, December 9th starting at 5:30 PM. 

Happy hour on Friday is a great way to start your weekend. Come and join your friends from Party Express to unwind, catch up and ease into your weekend. As this is a public venue, feel free t o bring a friends, family or co-workers to enjoy the music, etc.    – the more, the merrier!

 

 

P.S. – I can't say too often  how much I appreciate the continued support adn encouragement that I receive from the members of PartyExpres and other MeetUp groups. Thank you.    -Tom
item.how_to_find_us: We'll be in the bar area

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Happy Hour - Come chill out with The Captain
